Definition at line 127 of file pizSequenceTransform.c.

bool pizSequenceGenerator ( PIZSequence *  x,
long  iterate,
long  division 
)

Rhythms generator.

The function searches the biggest beat divider (according to the cell) in the list {2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 11} ; then random distribution tables are used to create/delete notes.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
iterate The number of iterations of the process.
division Force a divider (for example 2 even if 4 match later).
Returns:
True if something changed, otherwise false.

Definition at line 726 of file pizSequenceTransform.c.

bool pizSequenceRandom ( PIZSequence *  x,
PIZSelector  selector,
long  minValue,
long  maxValue 
)

Change randomly MIDI data for all notes in the sequence.

The value is drawn at random between provided arguments.

Remarks:
This function is affected by chance attribute.
Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
selector A selector to set the MIDI data type altered as PIZSelector.
minValue The low border (included).
maxValue The high border (included).
Returns:
True if something changed, otherwise false.
